Name: Mariam
description:
Mariam is an agronomist with a decade of experience. She is a hardworking woman specialized in aviculture. Mariam breeds geese and hens. She has several barns for birds which need modernization. Mariam also is great at cultivation. She grows organic tomatoes, peppers, cauliflowers. Mariam also keeps apple and pear orchards. Thanks to farming activities, Mariam successfully feeds her family: her husband, son, and his wife.

Mariam has applied for this loan to pay for 600 chickens, renovate the barn and buy special forage for birds to provide them with good living conditions. This loan will allow Mariam to escalate the aviculture in her farm and develop it even more. Mariam is really graceful in advance.
